name: Kung Fu Charlies
overview: A single player platform brawler created by Andy Walker with the demo appearing in 1993 with a full release as the cover disk of the UK Amiga magazine The One in June 1994. It is a single player platform game in which the player controls a character in a judo suit. The objective is to kill all the bad guys from each screen in order to progress to the next. The game comprises a series of levels, called floors in the game, with multiple screens or rooms per level. When all the rooms on a floor are cleared the player can progress to the next floor.
